title: [TOURNAMENT] A December to Recemember - Pacific Peninsula

embed.description: Welcome to PacificPeninsula.net! We are proud to announce our website is finally up & running. Keep an eye out for tournaments and events! In the near future, we will have a tournament system for you all to sign-up and play with ease!

body:
**Dear Summoners,**
#PACIFIC PENINSULA
#A DECEMBER TO REMEMBER
This month Pacific Peninsula will be hosting an event! We need 16 teams to compete. For more information, please visit our website event's page http://www.pacificpeninsula.net/a-december-to-remember/

We are currently still in the process of creating a whole team, if you think you have what it takes, please check out this link http://www.pacificpeninsula.net/about-us/join-us/

Cheers,

bollockz

replies.body:
Best of luck Summoners! I wish all of you best of luck!

Keep up the good work bollockz!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}Can't wait to spectate this awesome event.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
